basics.name: Andre Huaman Yovera
basics.label: Computer Engineer | Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a Software Engineer with 6 years of professional experience in developing technological solutions, specialized in .NET, clean architectures and automated testing. During this time I have worked in more than 5 software companies developing end-to-end systems applying good architecture, testing and deployment practices. I am passionate about research and the challenge of applying emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, blockchain and data science.

work.name: R y M Ingenieros SAC
work.position: Senior Software Engineer | Mobile and Web Systems Development
work.summary: Led the development of technological solutions for RYM Engineers, covering projects in Peru and Panama. Complete development of Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru, using .NET MAUI and Xamarin, including scalable architecture design, intuitive interfaces, geolocation, maps and route and fare algorithms.
highlights: Complete development of Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru
Research and development of systems for the hotel sector in Panama
Design and development of systems for the shipping and port sector in Panama
Comprehensive technological project management with agile methodologies

work.name: AmazonTI
work.summary: As a Software Engineer at AmazonTI, I led development initiatives within a company specialized in IT infrastructure. Development of web, mobile and desktop applications to complement the company's infrastructure services.
highlights: Development of web, mobile and desktop applications
Implementation of customized software solutions for corporate clients
Creation of data analysis and web scraping tools
Participation in the expansion of the software development division

work.name: EVENTECH SpA
work.summary: I led the technology strategy and actively participated in software development as a technology consultant. Planning and architecture of comprehensive technological solutions, implementation of solutions based on artificial intelligence and data science.
highlights: Planning and architecture of comprehensive technological solutions
Implementation of solutions based on artificial intelligence and data science
Cybersecurity and ethical hacking services for companies
Creation of innovative technological products for CORFO and SERCOTEC fund applications

work.name: ONEUP
work.summary: I participated in the development of comprehensive technological solutions for important companies in the aviation and retail sector. Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET, PHP and ASP.NET technologies.
highlights: Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET, PHP and ASP.NET technologies
Implementation of e-commerce systems for airline ticket sales
Development of web scraping solutions for strategic data collection
Integration with SAP systems for business management

work.name: R y M Ingenieros SAC
work.summary: As a Software Engineer at RYM, I led the development of an innovative Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru, representing the company's first significant technological project.
highlights: Complete development of mobile application using .NET MAUI (Xamarin) technologies
Design and implementation of scalable software architecture
Integration of geolocation and mapping systems
Development of algorithms for route and fare calculation

projects.name: HelpDesk System - Ticket Management and Technical Support
projects.description: Enterprise ticket management and helpdesk system developed with .NET 9. Implements Clean Architecture, DDD, CQRS and progressive versioning (V1/V2/V3). Includes ticket management with automatic workflow, IT inventory, knowledge base, executive dashboard with real-time metrics and JWT authentication.

projects.name: RestaurantePro - Comprehensive Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Complete restaurant management system developed with modern Microsoft technologies (.NET 9). Includes 3 specialized applications: mobile app (.NET MAUI), administrative web (Blazor) and public web (Blazor).

projects.name: VetCarePro - Comprehensive Veterinary Management System
projects.description: Enterprise system for comprehensive veterinary clinic management, focused on optimizing processes and improving the experience of both medical staff and clients. Includes patient management, inventory control, automatic reminders and integrated POS.

projects.name: Atsa Airlines
projects.description: Flight ticket sales platform with complete e-commerce system.

projects.name: eFTR StarPeru
projects.description: Aircraft flight logbook system with native mobile application.

projects.name: Vamo.Pe - Motorcycle Taxi Application
projects.description: Uber-like application for motorcycle taxis in Lima with geolocation, maps and route and fare algorithms.

projects.name: Pharmacy Data Web Scraping System
projects.description: Automated system for collecting pharmacy data from websites with data analysis.
